scene_description_enriched: A single female figure, likely the Virgin Mary, is depicted in profile, holding a flower in her left hand. She wears a wimple and a long, draped robe. The background is filled with a dotted pattern, suggesting a celestial or ethereal setting, and is framed by an arched element at the top. The lower portion of the image shows a stylized representation of foliage and possibly a stone ledge, indicating an outdoor or garden setting.
